mapper.select: SELECT D.MEDIUM_CODE_KOR_NAME AS SB_NAME ,D.MEDIUM_CODE AS SB_VALUE , CASE WHEN D.MEDIUM_CODE = #{p_rank_code} THEN 'selected=\"selected\"' ELSE '' END AS SB_SELECTED FROM ITSM_COM_CODE_INFO_MASTER M ,ITSM_COM_CODE_INFO_DETAIL D WHERE 1 = 1 AND M.SEQ_ID = D.ICCIM_SEQ_ID AND D.USE_YN = 'Y' AND M.SEQ_ID = 'ITSM_SQTYPE006_00004' ORDER BY D.ORDER_NUM

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM ITSM_COM_USER_INFO WHERE 1=1
AND LOGIN_ID LIKE '%' || #{p_login_id} || '%'
AND NAME LIKE '%' || #{p_name} || '%'
AND STATUS = #{p_sel_status}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT LOGIN_ID ,NAME ,E_MAIL ,COMPANY_NAME FROM ITSM_COM_USER_INFO) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{start} + #{length} ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{length} ORDER BY RNUM ASC
